name: Autumn Dashboard Theme
description: A theme for your dashboard for the best season of all (hint: fall is the best season).
additional_info: This theme appears to be broken? Sorry, I'll fix it Made by me. Feel free to contact me if a page doesn't look right and I'll fix it asap! The tree is optional, of course. I'm not that great an artist and I can't blame you if you don't want it. Before and after (images too large to upload, sorry) Updated (10/30/2012): New dogear (not as great but hey it's better??? I'll work on that some more. Better tree. Added/Fixed pages from the website in the code.
